participant_2.background:
I have never been to a fortune teller, as I believe that my future is in my own hands.
my mother is in the hospital.
my dog s name is wonwon.
I am not sure of my ethnic background because I was adopted.
i really like watching star trek.

content.text: Hello there, how is your day going?
It is going well, my mother is in the hospital but that aside I am doing well.
I am sorry to hear that about your mother, hopefully she recovers quickly!
Thank you, she is doing better today than she was yesterday.
That is good news! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch Star Trek, play with my dog WonWon, and I just started writing and recording blues music in my spare time.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I hope you get to release some of your music soon!
Thank you! I am hoping to release a single soon, but I am just starting out so we will see how it goes.
Good luck with that! I am sure it will be great!
I am from Tennessee, how about you?
Oh cool! I have always wanted to visit Texas.
You should! It is a great place to visit.
